sub_title: Directeur (member of the Executive Board), De Nederlandsche Bank N.V.
summary:
Responsible for monetary affairs: economics, financial stability, financial markets, payments and statistics. 

Part-time professor (European Economic Policy) at the School of Business and Economics at Maastricht University.

Alternate member of the ECB Governing Council. Member of the Social & Economic Council (Sociaal-Economische Raad). Member of the Committee on Payments and Market Infrastructure (CPMI).

Specialties: financial regulation, prudential supervision, pensions, insurance, banking, financial markets, economics, monetary policy, ALM, economic policy-making, central banking issues, sustainable finance, European integration, asset management, economics of climate change, fintech, management and leadership.

Happy to link, but I will not consider commercial proposals or invitations.
